Package com.sirf.microedition.location.extensions

Interface Summary
BTGPSDiscovererListener This interface collects methods that enable the application to receive asynchronous events generated by BTGPSDiscoverer to notify Bluetooth GPS device discovery status.
NMEALocationListener Like LocationListener, NMEAListener represents a listener that receives events associated with a particular NMEAProvider.
POIServiceProvider Interface for service providers that provide directory search services.
SatelliteInfoListener Application may implement this interface and register it with a SatelliteInfoProvider to get the information about the Satellites which being acquired or tracked, or being used in the Location computation.
 

Class Summary
BTGPSDiscoverer This class provides method to search for Bluetooth GPS device.
LocationProviderConfiguration The Configuration class provides APIs to configure AGPS Server, its port and the GPS serial communication or set the BT-GPS device address.
NMEALocationProvider The NMEAProvider implements the NMEA-providing module, generating NMEA sentences for registered listeners.
SatelliteContext The SatelliteContext class contains the additional information for Satellites that are currently being acquired or tracked, or have been used in the location computation.
SatelliteInfo The SatelliteInfo class is used by the SatelliteContext to provide information related to one Satellite used in computing the associated Location.
SatelliteInfoProvider The SatelliteInfoProvider provide method to register and remove SateliiteInfoListener.
SiRFProviderManager This class is similar to ProviderManager so that applications can get instances of SiRF related ServiceProviders.
SystemConfiguration This class is a central point to configure system parameters.
